data.description: I have edited my Animated watch face to a static image and to include the weather as well.  This watchface includes the countdown to the number of days before the Force Awakens is released on December 17th 2015.  It shows the Time, Date, Weather (if you are in the US it displays as Fahrenheit, otherwise as Celsius) and Battery (as a percentage until it reaches below 20% and then states Use the Force).  I hope you like this as an alternative to the animated image and to include the weather as well.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 1.2 tweaked time and days to font sizes

data.title: Star Wars Force Awakens with Time, date, Weather and Countdown

data.author: Aylatan

changelog.release_notes: v1.2: Removed vibration on disconnection
v1.1: Updated the vibration so that it only vibrates on the disconnection.
v1.0: Initial version. Displays time, date, battery life and connection status + QR code is readable.

data.description:
Displays the time in a QR Code.

The time and date are written inside the QR code, as well as the Bluetooth connection status and the battery life.

The QR code is also a valid code giving the time, date, battery life and bluetooth connection status!

Pictures 1 & 2: 20:55 07/11  20% BT:Off
Pictures 3 & 4: 20:55 07/11  80% BT:On

The time and date are written in the middle of the code, as highlighted in pictures 2 and 4.
The Bluetooth connection status is the top left pixel (white = disconnected, black = connected).
The current battery level is displayed as a vertical bar on top right of the QR code.

latest_release.release_notes: v1.2: Removed vibration on disconnection

data.title: QR Time

data.author: TMunz
data.description: The picture above shows the watchface of the Alpha Binary Clock. The orange dots display the time, the grey borders the date. The time can be simply calculated by summing up their values, which are represented in binary. The following explanation shows how to calculate the time and date for the moment shown in the image. The binary dots values are from the bottom to the top: 1, 2, 4, 8, 16, 32. Hour: 1 + 2 + 16 = 19; Minute: 16 = 16; Seconds: 1 + 4 + 16 + 32 = 53; => 19:16:53; Day: 2 = 2; Month: 1 + 2 + 8 = 11; Year: 1 + 2 + 3 + 4 = 15; => 2.11.(20)15 (Year is shown with modulo 50)
data.title: Alpha Binary Clock

data.author: singleserveapps

changelog.release_notes: -- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite) watches
-- Recompiled using Pebble SDK 4

-- Now the "Twelve o'clock marker" color option can be used to change the color of the twelve o'clock dot or hour marker
-- Slightly updated alignment of digital time display
-- Added an option to always display a seconds hand
-- Improved method for checking elapsed time since last weather update
-- Switched weather provider from Yahoo! Weather to OpenWeatherMap.org
- Slightly lengthened the watch hands
- Fixed an issue with retrieving Yahoo! Weather using GPS (credit: Freakified)
- Improvements to battery usage
- Added option to shake to briefly display a seconds hand
-- Updated to display "....." for "Unknown" Yahoo! Weather conditions
-- Fixed an issue when Yahoo! Weather returned an 'Unknown' weather condition
- Slightly decreased the width of the default watch hands

- Minor alignment updates for text items
- Optimizing battery, digital time and date information updates

- Added minute markers display option for Pebble Time (Basalt)
- Removed 3, 6, 9 dots display option
- Includes a fix for weather information not updating for some Android devices

- Added option to change the color for hour/minute hands and dial markers
- Corrected issue where battery information wouldn't apply text color
- Added option to display minute marker lines for Pebble Time Round (Chalk)

- Added option to display battery percentage
- Corrected issue where last weather update time could display with incorrect 12/24hr value

- Added thinner watch hand option
- Minor alignment updates for date and digital time elements

data.description:
Inspired by Pebble's Tictoc watchface with added weather and date information.

- Select colors for hour/minute hands, time markers, background and text items
- Select how often OpenWeatherMap.org weather information is updated
- Retrieve weather information using GPS or by manually entering location
- Option to display today's lo - hi temperatures (+last weather update time)
- Option to always display a seconds hand, or battery-friendly alternative to briefly display a seconds hand with a shake
- Vibrate on Bluetooth disconnect option
- Select from two different font sizes and watch hand widths
- Options to display time in digital format and battery percentage

If you're enjoying the TICTOC WEATHER watchface, please click the heart above. You may also send feedback using the Support link below.

latest_release.release_notes: -- Added support for Pebble 2 (Diorite) watches

data.title: Tictoc Weather

data.author: JR Mobley

changelog.release_notes:
Added optional vibration on bluetooth disconnect.
Added option to start the calendar week on Monday.
Added option to disable the World Time display.
Fixed bugs in the calendar layout.
Initial release.

data.description:
These unique six-segment numerals were designed in 1974 by Shuji Maezawa at Seiko.  The design doesn't seem to have ever been put into production on an actual watch.  I've chosen some typical digital watch functions of the era to create this impression of how such a watch might have been.

Features Calendar function and World Time display - a flick of the wrist will cycle between local time, a configurable world time, and UTC (Zulu time).  Display automatically reverts to local time after a short delay.

latest_release.release_notes:

Added option to disable the World Time display.
Fixed bugs in the calendar layout.

data.description:
An analog watch face with a difference.

The minutes are shown in the normal way, but the hour appear as a blue wedge in a circle riding on the minute hand: the passenger.   
Note midnight and midday are empty (the zero hours).

AM/PM is indicated in the centre circle.


Screenshots:  3:45AM, 9:56PM, 5:11AM, 8:40PM, 4:36AM


Design & Programming Copyright © 2015 Nev Rawlins

changelog.release_notes: 修复pebble time报错的问题

1、修复了农历在5个字的时候超宽的问题
2、将节气和节日计算放到本地计算
继续优化电池使用
修复一个耗电的虫子

1、加入24节气和节日显示。
2、修改了部分文字没对齐的问题。

1、农历改到使用本地计算
2、优化了算法，减少电池消耗
使用统一的天气源

1、添加了久坐提醒功能（可选）
2、允许设置提醒间隔（30分钟、40分钟、45分钟、1小时）
3、允许设置关闭提醒时间区间（下班或休息时间）

1. 在设置里面加入了“清新版”的表盘样式，可以自由选择清新版和原始版
2. 清新版加入了周别
3. 清新版加入了天气图片
4. 修正了电池的图标，并且充电时可以显示充电电量
5. 尝试修正了每小时定时更新天气的问题（待广大朋友验证）
去掉了表盘加载时没必要的震动

1.4版包括
1、支持不开启gps手动设置所在城市（输入中文城市名）
2、加入手机与pebble连接上时的轻微震动提示
1.3版包括 1、修复没有网络环境下，天气情况和农历无法显示的问题（取最后一次保存在手表本地的数据显示）

1.1版本
修复一个时间问题

中国面子
1、第一款全面支持地区显示、农历、天气、PM25(空气质量）的表盘，包括你日常需要的全部信息！
2、天气每小时自动更新，你也可手动切换表面刷新！
3、精确显示你的城市信息！
4、天气信息出自中国中央气象台准确实时信息！
5、农历包括生肖、年号、日期！
6、空气质量除了包括PM25的指数，还包括空气污染级别！

请点赞红星支持该国产应用！

2、天气每小时自动更新，你也可手动切换表面刷新！

5、农历包括生肖、年号、日期！
6、空气质量除了包括PM25的指数，还包括空气污染级别！

data.description:
MarkHand3 is a very configurable analog&digital watch.

This watchface is a successor of MarkHand2.

Additional features from MarkHand2
-  background circle image
-  vibe hourly offset (0 to -10min)
-  vibe hourly available time
-  three user preset times to vibe
-  three user configuration settings  to save and load

Configurations

[General Setting]
- apply presets 
- load user settings (none/slot1/slot2/slot3)

--- detail ---
[FACE]
- color theme (black/white/Blue/Green/Yellow/Brown/Pink...)
- background circle (off/white/black/blue/red...)
- hour dots number (12/6/4/1)
- 10 minutes dots display (off/on)

[ARM]
- minute arm display (always/off/at shaked)
- hour arm movement (smooth/step hour/half smooth)
- hour arm layer (upper/lower)

[DIGITS]
- date display (off/always/at shaked)
- day of week display (off/always/at shaked)
- digital time display(off/always/at shaked)
- second display (off/always/at shaked)
- digital time type (12H/24H)

[INDICATOR]
- battery indication icon display (off/always/at shaked/at few level/at few or shaked)
- battery indicator type (icon/percent)
- Bluetooth indication icon display (off/always/at shaked/at disconnected/at disc. or shaked)

[VIBES]
- vibe hourly (off/on)
- vibe hourly offset (0min/-1min..-10min)
- vibe hourly on time from (0..23) to (0..23)
- vibe at connection status changed (off/on)
- vibe at time1 (0..23):(0..59) (off/on)
- vibe at time2 ..
- vibe at time3 ..

[USER SETTINGS]
- save user settings (none/slot1/slot2/slot3)
- config string (for backup/restore with string)

latest_release.release_notes: - modify digital font for ease of watching

data.author: Adam Singer

changelog.release_notes: - Left bar now shows a more granular representation of battery usage
- Bugfix for battery not auto updating

- Left bar depletes if your watch usage is draining your battery at a faster rate than the watch's expected battery life (auto detects if you have 7 or 10 days expected battery life)
How it works... 
If you have 1 bar missing it means you are draining the battery at 1.1x rate, if you have 5 bars missing it means you are draining the battery at 1.5x rate, etc.
- Right bar will go empty if Bluetooth disconnects

- fixes persisting settings
- adds support for original black and white pebble

- Adds configuration page
- User can configure temperature units and theme
- Adds more granular battery indicator
fixed font sizing to display text smoother

- Adds weather
- Made text color more visible
- updated icon
fixed spelling of laser

data.description:
- A Good Looking James Bond Watchface that takes full advantage of the pebble's square face  
- Battery indicator at the bottom of the watch face
- Left bar depletes if your watch usage is draining your battery at a faster rate than the watch's advertised battery life (auto detects if you have 7 or 10 days expected battery life). This updates each time the battery life changes.

How it works... 
The bar represents a percentage (the 3 large portions represent 50%, and the 5 small portions represent 50%). 
The percentage showing of the entire bar represents the percentage that your watch's battery is lasting compared to the it's specifications.
If it is full it means you are getting the most out of your battery, if it is half-full it means you are getting half of the time you could be.

- Right bar will go empty if Bluetooth disconnects 
- Displays date and time  
- Displays weather 
- Select authentic or practical mode for display theme changes
- Pebble has given this an A grade for battery life
- Based on the Golden eye watch face  

- Heart if you like martini's!!!
- feel free to email me with suggestions!

latest_release.release_notes: - Left bar now shows a more granular representation of battery usage

data.title: James Bond 007

changelog.release_notes: 1.2 - Recompiled for timeline API, and fixed issue where time does not update

v1.1
Decreased sensitivity for heart rate mode.
Now the 30s measuring period only occurs once per load of watchface - so if you wish to measure heart rate twice you need to skip to another watchface and back.  This was to avoid issues where in general use the watch kept buzzing unexpectedly.  Also removed buzz on bluetooth disconnect - though that is still visible from the icons.

Initial version.

Watchface with Mdot and triathlon logos and date.

Based on https://github.com/pmc11/PebbleModernFace 

Single shake displays the battery and bluetooth info, a second shake enters the heartrate timer mode

changelog.release_notes: Optimized for Pebble 2, added app glance with current timezone
Added Clay configuration

Minor polishing
Minor polishing

Minor polishing
Initial release, not tested on Pebble Round hardware (round not yet available)

data.description:
The ultimate World time clock for Pebble Time, Pebble 2 and Pebble Round. Configurable for 35+ cities/time zones, including half-hour offset zones. 

Now supports 3 favorite time zones. Cycle through the 3 favorites with a flick of the wrist, no need to use the phone to switch between favorite timezones.

Other features:
Supports 12/24 hour local clock with A/P indicator.
Weather icon with temperature in C or F (local weather).  
Moon phase display. Battery icon.
Local sunrise and sunset time.
Days of week in English, Dutch, French, German, Italian, Spanish and Klingon.
A-Grade energy friendly (extremely low battery usage).
BT disconnect warning (temp goes red with optional vibration). 
Keeps track of DST and timezone date. 
DST on dual time can be set to Automatic (recommended), On or Off.

This watchface is also available as a Watch App. Even more information and completely configurable from your wrist! Now includes an on-board compass!

2 days free trial, price $2.99. This is a bundle offer. If you purchase this watchface you can download the watchapp (same name) for free!

latest_release.release_notes: Optimized for Pebble 2, added app glance with current timezone

data.title: World BloxX 70's

data.author: Sam Jerichow

changelog.release_notes: Soto X is now configurable! I recommend the background to be bezel color, the minutes to be favorite color and the hours white. But of course you can have all the fun you want!

data.description:
Summary: minimalistic analog-ish watchface
Readability: easy
Examples: 03:20 (black PT/S), 04:50 (black PT/S), 05:00 (gold PTS), 10:10 (red PT)

Soto X is a minimalistic analog-ish digital watchface. Why ish? The hour hand always shows the exact hour - no guessing here. This might look unusual at times like 10:50, but you'll get used to it. The main design element of this watchface is the frame. It holds the minute hand which extends from it until the center of the display. The hour hand is shorter, has got another colour and is covered by the frame. The colour layout configurable and comes preset differently for the various types of Pebbles.

Design / Programming / Copyright © 2015 Sam Jerichow / configuration page by Nev Rawlins / Thanks so much Nev!!

latest_release.release_notes: Soto X is now configurable! I recommend the background to be bezel color, the minutes to be favorite color and the hours white. But of course you can have all the fun you want!

data.description: Retro design watchface.  The magenta circle expands with the hours, the cyan circle expands with the minutes.  Lines mark off the hours and 10-minute intervals.
data.title: Paragon

data.author: Turner Yey

changelog.release_notes: Support for Pebble Time 2 and Quiet Time icon.
Added option to turn off bluetooth vibration after midnight.
Removed the ball on the second hand due to request
Fixed settings not saved on Aplite.
Support for Aplite firmware 3.
Support for Pebble Time Round.
Fixed settings not saved properly for backlight gesture.
Added support for gesture activated backlight by Matthew Hungerford.
Vibrate on bluetooth disconnect is now optional.
Tweaked some of the pixels a little
Smoothed the corners a little bit

data.description:
Based on TH3, but changed to a square face.

This simple watch animates when you go back to it from the timeline.

You can change the color of every part of the watch in the settings page.

The second hand is hidden by default to maximize battery life, but you can turn it on in settings.

When bluetooth connection is lost, the watch vibrates and shows the bluetooth icon.

When battery is under 30% a low battery icon appears on the top right.

When quiet time is on, a speaker icon appears on the left.

Hourly vibrate can be turned on by specifying a time range in settings.

Text size can be increased in the settings page.

latest_release.release_notes: Support for Pebble Time 2 and Quiet Time icon.

data.title: TH4

data.author: payneardo

version 1.0

data.description: This is an analog watch face with the James Bond as background to the clock. The background behind Bond changes with the weather (cloud, sun, snow, clear & rain). The temperature and location is displayed with Bond himself. I hope you enjoy :)  It has now been updated so for US locations it automatically displays temperature as fahrenheit and elsewhere is displayed as celsius.

latest_release.release_notes: Version 2.0 has been updated so for US locations it automatically displays temperature as fahrenheit and elsewhere is displays as celsius.

data.title: James Bond Analog with Weather

data.description: This is an analog watch face with the Capitain America Shield as background to the clock. The background behind the shield changes with the weather (cloud, sun, snow, clear & rain).  The temperature and location is displayed on the shield. It has now been updated so for US locations it automatically displays temperature as fahrenheit and elsewhere is displayed as celsius.  Also updated the weather images as it was displaying snow instead of clear.

latest_release.release_notes: Major Update, where for people in the US it automatically displays Weather as fahrenheit and elsewhere is displays as celsius.  Also updated the weather images as it was displaying snow instead of clear.

data.title: Captain America Shield Analog
